1655040.name: Automobilista 2 Premium Expansion Packs
1655040.description:
The Premium Expansion Packs includes all Expansion Packs and DLCs with the exception of the 5 Premium DLC Tracks (Hockenheimring, Silverstone, Nurburgring, Spa-Francorchamps & one TBA), and is designed for users who may not have interest on those tracks or already acquired them individually or via the Premium Track Pack - buying this pack & Premium Track Pack is equivalent to owning the 2020-2022 Season Pass.

Currently, the pack offers the Racin´ USA Expansion Pack (all 3 parts), of which Part 1 and 2 are already available.
1655040.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
